Data

Europeana is a database of some 30 million cultural and historical documents, images, sound and video files from Europe's museums, libraries, galleries and archives.

Filter by:

  • Archaeology
  • Natural History
  • Photographs
  • Prints
  • Drawings
  • Maps
  • History
  • Architecture
  • Suggest a Dataset
  • Help improve this content

  • Napoleon on artwork, drawings and documents from the Amsterdam Museum

    A beautiful collection of about 70 items related to Napoleon Bonaparte (1769 – 1829).

    Dataset provided by Amsterdam Museum. Contact info@amsterdammuseum.nl for more details.

    View this data in:
    Portal API Console
    links Maps Architecture History

  • Maps and Drawings from the Catálogo Colectivo De La Red De Bibliotecas De Los Archivos Estatales

    More than 7,000 maps, city plans & architectural drawings/plans from the Catálogo Colectivo de la Red de Bibliotecas de los Archivos Estatales. The collection is a union catalog of state archives and libraries in Spain. Spanish language.

    Dataset provided by Catálogo Colectivo de la Red de Bibliotecas de los Archivos Estatales. Contact ccbae.dglab@mcu.es for more details.

    View this data in:
    Portal API Console
    links Maps Architecture History
